Hey folks!

This is sorta related to junit, but not specifically.  I am wri=
ting some scripts to do some automated tests and need to report it to our H=
udson servers in a junit style xml format.  Unfortunately after I want to s=
ay is hundreds of web searches I have been unable to find a good explanatio=
n of what the junit xml format is.  

Does anyone have a good page or know =
of a link to a schema or dtd or something for it.  

Thanks
Jason
